titleStmt.title: Von Ludwig Wittgenstein an John Maynard Keynes, 7. 8. 1925
titleStmt.author: Wittgenstein, Ludwig

sourceDesc.p: Original an der King's College Library in Cambridge; Kopie im BA. Publiziert (Letters, S. 121; deutsch: Briefe, S. 151; Cambridge Letters, S. 214; WiC, S. 156).

list.item: 2007/06: Conversion from Folio Flat File to XML

div.p: Thanks very much for your letter & the Â£10. I will travel by Dieppe-Newhaven as you suggest & shall arrive at Newhaven on Tuesday 18th in the morning by the boat which leaves Dieppe at midnight.
